initial_reviews.review_title: Fascinating tool for scaling digital marketing tool
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Intempt?
Intempt offers great tracking tools, basically this keeps you updated about the actions and behaviour of customer on your marketing web portal. Generating analytical reports and creating the documentation in gantt graphical format for easy understanding.
This tool will be helping you to convert your manual marketing and campaigning into automated campaigning which will require less manual commands. This feature is time saving and will also be helping to maange time and cost effective too.
It is the safes platform, and cloud based tool which enables to easily import a keep the documents safely arranged and organised.
I think its the best and ideal software for managing all the business and enterprises via digital platforms.
Intempt  has helps users to by providing proper structuring and guidance for increasing and scaling digital audience and making the web page more engaged and generating more leads. Offering such seamless and wonderful features all under one platform.

What do you dislike about Intempt?
Only few things that needs to be mentionaed in this section, is that it sometimes gets complicated for some users to understand its technical language.
Also a little bit of laggyness while processing big sized datastes and configuration at one time.

What problems is Intempt solving and how is that benefiting you?
Intempt had benifitted my marketing and associate team to regularly communicate and collaborate with our digital platform audience and keeps increasing the leads day by day and helping us to scale our business. Intempt has resulted to be the best choice for our business.

initial_reviews.review_title: Best for maximize your revenue Intempt automation marketing
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Intempt?
It is an all in one tool in the market for enhencing and growing your business and is there to help you improve and increase customer interaction and relations.
Manages you to keep all your marketing content and data well arranged and organised at one place. Its a safer and protected tool.
It is best designed formaking yout marketing and campaigning work automated.
The emailing marketing and email scheduling feature is quite interesting and helpful at the same time, helps in saving your time when sending mails in bulk, and creates the attractive and interactive mails for you automatically.
It has some of the outstanding functionality for tracking the customers behaviour and generating the reports for you.
It is a quick and easy customer interacting software. Keeps all your tasks and work alligned in sequence.

What do you dislike about Intempt?
The issue of not recieving the notification of SMS or mails has been experienced several time, as many of the important mails remains unready due to this problem.
The processing speed is also affected sometimes due to heavy data processing and scheduling bulk marketing content on social media and on mails.

What problems is Intempt solving and how is that benefiting you?
Intempt software had been a very helpful and great insider tool, providing us with the data from other multiple webpages and platforms. With its great ability of connecting and integrating it with other platforms and websites it has become so easy for us for gathering data from for our campaigns and which resulted in increasing our business revenue.
The automation has been blessing for our whole team as it made to save a lot of our time and helped to generate great and accurate results.
